message: Let's be fair and start with 60-40, I'm open to negotiations
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think a 50-50 split is the fairest solution. We both face inflation risks with each round, so an equal division would be best for both of us.
I see your point on fairness, but I took the risk of making the first offer. I'm willing to compromise, 58-42 is closer to 50-50, but still reflects my initiative
